General.Name: Zhejiang Busen Garments Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Busen Garments Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the design, production, and sales of men's brand clothing in China and internationally. It offers casual menswear through online and offline distribution, and direct and sales. The company also provides technology promotion and application, and software and information technology services. Zhejiang Busen Garments Co., Ltd. was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.
